name: Dusk of the Cage
description: Sin descripción

name: The Orc Invasion
description: Game is a narrative driven 2,5D platformer shooter. It's based on collecting gold and resources from battlefield, learning new recipes, crafting everything necessary for yourself, your army and your mobile castle from basic to advanced.

name: HellFurnace
description: Go to save the world from HellFurnace. HellFurnace is a 2D boss rush game in which the protagonist, who has fallen into another world, defeats the boss. Avoid enemy attacks to collect beads and create weapons to defeat the boss.

name: Heavy Rockets
description:
Prove you’re the fastest and deadliest rocket pilot. Challenge friends or shoot for high scores in furious battles and races across the galaxy.
The classic cave shooter has returned, and it’s on iPhone and iPad! Take flight with your rocket and blasters, with specially designed controls that feel just like the arcade. Hone your skills in high-speed race maps and dangerous battle zones – then play with friends via shared Wi-Fi, ghost rockets, Game Center or Facebook. Collect gems to upgrade your ship – but remember, when you’re facing a rival rocket only your skills can bring you victory!

name: Rally Point 3
description:
Get ready... Go!
Welcome to Xform Games' first steps into mobile gaming!
Push your car to the limit, but don't overheat your engine. How far can you go?
Unlock new cars and tracks by beating the target time. Have fun!
More Rally Point coming soon!

name: Finding Hannah
description: Hannah’s got it all: a well-paying job, a fancy coffee machine, and a comfortable life – so why isn’t she happy? Explore beautiful scenes and find hidden objects to learn more about the characters and their journey of self-discovery. The story of a family: experience a light-hearted drama featuring three generations of women - their loves, their struggles, and their joys. Hannah is a woman searching for answers. She turns to her grandmother, Eva, and her mother, Sigrid, to find that each of them has her own unique story to tell. How are their hopes and dreams passed down through the generations?

name: Brix and Trix
description: Brix and Trix is an addictive and engaging puzzle game with the goal of removing all blocks from the screen. The game is guaranteed to provide to you with hours of entertainment and increasing levels of difficulties.

name: XO Master
description:
Are you up for a 5-in-a-row xo game?
Want to enjoy both single offline tic tac toe & online tic tac toe multiplayer battles?
Well, you get that and much more with XO Master - Offline & Online 5-in-a-row Tic Tac Toe! The most addictive version of a tic tac toe game is finally here! Unlike the classical tic tac toe, you probably played at school, in this version you will have to draw 5-in-a-row on the mega xo board to win!

name: Foosball Cup World
description:
Foosball Cup World: The ultimate table soccer game experience for you!
A brand new experience for the millions of fans, building on the success of the original Foosball Cup game.

name: Clash of Fingers
description: Defeat your friends, family and everybody. Choose your character, make a clan with friends and defeat others everywhere. Play against your friends and family on the same device or solo vs CPU. Each player chooses one side and a character. Tap as fast as you can, the fastest tapper wins!

name: Vaccine Case
description:
Store, mix, and pour the vaccine out to eradicate the virus.
Your brains’ll be pouring out too with the soaring difficulty of this “gusher” puzzle game. That’s what Vaccine Case’s all about.

name: Fishing Mates
description: Fishing Mate, the smart and easy-to-enjoy fishing game!

name: Tank Legend Online: League of Tanks
description:
Experience epic battles in the world’s first Tank Moblie MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena). Form alliances and fight together in 1 vs. 1 or 2 vs. 2 combat.
Hone your skills as you battle.

name: Yorkshire's Great Race
description:
Welcome to the Yorkshire’s Great Race!
Take on 4 international riders for a chance to win the championship for Great Britain and team Leeds Bradford Airport.
Experience familiar locations in the beautiful Yorkshire countryside recreated in stunning local watercolour-inspired paintings, and get a clear overview of the course with the classic top down view.

name: Golf is Hard
description:
Golf was invented by the Scottish in 1491 as a way of transporting radishes directly into the mouths of distant sheep.
Play 18 holes of golf on a lovely summers day in the never-ending search for the perfect score, which is 18.
Golf is known to be quite hard.
No walking on the grass.

name: Death Moto 3
description: Do you like violence and passion to fight? In this chaotic world is fast, in case of be placed in jeopardy to blaze a new trail. Beyond those rookie driver, never slow down, would be smashed to pieces.

name: Burnin' Rubber Shift
description: Finally you can experience the speed and power of the Burnin' Rubber series in the palm of your hands! Push your reflexes to the limit in this extremely challenging highway race. The game is filled with all of your favourite BR racing cars with cool neon paintjobs perfectly suited for nighttime racing madness.

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered
description: Cities: Skylines - Remastered puts you in charge of a growing city, from the ground-breaking of its first streets to the ever-changing needs of thousands of citizens. Design, build, and manage the city of your dreams, from public services to civic policies, and challenge yourself to grow from a simple town to a bustling metropolitan hub.

name: Evermoon
description:
Evermoon: The Next-Gen 5v5 3-lane MOBA on Web3

Evermoon introduces an unparalleled 5v5, 3-lane MOBA experience, seamlessly integrating the excitement of MOBA gaming with the expansive capabilities of Web3 technology. Designed for a global audience, our platform offers a Free-To-Play-And-Earn dynamic, enriched with next-gen DeFi E-Sports, innovative NFT solutions, and cutting-edge Web3 tools. Set to transform the gaming landscape, Evermoon is crafted to provide an unparalleled gaming experience that's accessible to a global gamer!

name: Anime vs. Evil: Apocalypse
description: In Anime vs. Evil you will fight the monsters that take over the whole world by mystical polygonal magic. Find the survivors, look for the supplies, beat the story mode and finally finish with this mess!

name: Flame of Rebellion
description:
Flame of Rebellion is a freeware RPG-Maker 2000 game by the creator Lil_Lucy.
The leading global powers are threatened by an unknown force, that calls themselves by the name of "The Empire". No one knows how, but they possess technology that is way beyond what should be capable by modern human standards and seem to be unstoppable.
Even though these scary events happen all around the globe, some are yet mentally unaffected by all of this and live their lives like every other day, which includes the protagonist Roland. His day starts off as a normal school day, but since a lot of bus drivers called in sick, out of fear of a possible war, he is about to arrive late. When he arrived at the school, even his town is falling under attack by this mysterious force.
Being one of the few survivors of the attack, he and the others form a local rebellion group, in their attempt to stop the enemy.

name: Cipher Island
description:
Cipher Island is a cybersecurity educational game.

The great Captain Cipherbeard has sent you on a mission to find his buried treasure across three treacherous islands. The player must use Cryptography to decode ciphers that disclose the treasure's whereabouts.

name: StarSim
description:
Starsim is a sci-fi multi-genre (pausable real-time, text quest, Turn-based tactic) computer game where you can become anyone.

Players explore a partly-randomly generated galaxy, with each sector featuring multiple stars and planets. This leads to a universe with hundreds of planets, each with their own economy, government, and opinion of the player.

The game is not limited by borders and allows players an opportunity to influence the branching storyline. At the same time, the larger and more expansive game world lives and develops by itself. In Starsim players will have an opportunity to test their skills not only in outer space, but in turn-based tactics as well.

name: Super Mario
description: Super Mario features beautiful graphics courtesy of Bill Nagel, 13 unique enemies, 64 unique background tiles (some with animation), fast scrolling, powerups like growth or flower-power, fireballs, a somewhat-challenging boss, an animated ending scene, and an expansive easy-to-use World editor that can be run on a calculator.

name: My Extraordinary Girlfriend
description:
Life as a highschooler in the city is stressful enough, but your home also happens to be a hot spot for monsters and other supernatural occurrences. With gods, aliens, and monsters running around, you’re thankful you’re just an average guy… until you hear that the descendant of Hercules has been found. ‘Good for him,’ you say to yourself…

Things take a wild turn, however, when three girls suddenly transfer into your school and immediately begin asking for your hand in marriage! Isn’t it a bit too soon to think about stuff like that? Not for these three whimsical gals; the descendant of the goddess Athena, the daughter of a super villain, and an alien princess! You think this is all a joke, but these girls are persistent! ‘Average’ is no longer a word you can associate yourself with—not with all of the shenanigans you’re about to get tossed into!

description: "Jindou" it's a near-future sport where you fight with real swords that's really hot in Japan in the 2040s. Two girls enrolled into Murakumo Academy where said Jindou is taught. One of them is Kazamine Setsugekka, a rough and emotionally-driven girl who bolsters her blade with the unparalleled strength within her. The other is Suzakuin Momiji, a cool headed and incredibly precise girl with a prodigious sense for swordplay and a frightening sharp mind. These two, whose circumstances and personalities are completely different, both aim for the the title conferred upon the strongest in the academy, the "Toujinegi".

name: Sushi Bar Express
description:
Experience the dizzying life of a top sushi chef as you prepare sushi dishes in this exciting time-management cooking adventure.

Serve hordes of demanding patrons and build-up your menu by purchasing more recipes, to take with you to bigger and better restaurants.

Start a career as a sushi chef and absorb all of the wise teachings of your master. Slice, dice, roll and hammer sushi, and then serve it to customers as quickly as you can. Make sashimi, roll uramaki, pour sake, and feed the hungry hordes to collect cash. Catch coins as they fly by, and use the money you make to upgrade your equipment and purchase more recipes.

The characters and tone of Sushi Bar Express are presented in a light-hearted and comical style, designed to appeal to all types of players – ranging from children to adults, and all genders. Whimsical humour offers a counterpoint to the manic plate-juggling gameplay and helps players to feel comfortable and entertained throughout the game.

name: Ark: Ragnarok
description: Journey through an expansive 144 sq. kilometer environment where elements from The Island, Scorched Earth, and all new biomes are combined to bring the ultimate survivor experience. Whether tackling the extreme cold atop the highest mountains, harvesting resources from an active volcano, or just searching for that perfect base location, Ragnarok plays host to explorers and base builders alike. But survivors beware, Ragnarok houses such creatures as Polar Bears, Ice Wyverns, and a mystical creature many have yet to tame in the ARK universe. Ragnarok boasts many unique features such as: custom explorer notes, challenging dungeons, dungeon bosses, active hot springs, unique pickup-able/harvestable resources, new biomes, an active volcano, unique tree platform locations, environmental traps, unique ruins, and so much more combined with a beautiful world to explore.

name: Nurburgring-1
description:
Considered by many to be the first fully electronic, first-person driving simulator, this was Dr. Reiner Forest's attempt at miniaturizing the racecar driving experience. It directly inspired Ted Michon's game Night Racer, which in turn led to him working with Midway to create 280 Zzzap around the same time. Meanwhile, Atari designer Dave Sheppard saw a screenshot of what was very likely Nürburgring 1 in a magazine; this led to the company's own iteration, the better-known Night Driver.

The arcade cabinet has a black and white monitor, a steering wheel and two foot pedals for gas and brake. The screen is completely black with white rectangles representing roadside poles. A monitor overlay sticker displays the car hood and boxes at the bottom of the screen for the distance, speed and misses. The player gets 90 seconds to drive across the finish line; crashing the car results in a time penalty. The game plays the sound of the engine and screaming tires.

Swap and match many cute cake to gain points. Collect as many cakes as possible before you run out of moves!
Defeat the Evil witch!

name: Deadword
description: Deadword is a pixelated brain puzzler. Link four-letter words as you strategically move through the city, avoiding zombies, gathering supplies, and investigating clues. Discover Perks along the way that will give you the necessary skills to survive! Loot supplies and find items to patch your wounds, find your way, and distract the zombies! Can you escape Deadword?

name: The Dreadmill
description:
It will slam you, it will crush you, and it will ALWAYS end you. You will never beat it. It will never stop.
Tap to jump, avoiding everything The Dreadmill can throw at you. Reach the top to reset the floor and push further, collecting as much loot as you can. With randomly generated floors, brutal traps and explosive gameplay, The Dreadmill will always have new ways to destroy you.

name: Folf

Welcome to Folf!
This is where Football meets Golf.
The par 3 courses have been designed to challenge your putting skills. Shoot through portals and tight spaces to avoid the explosions and make the put.
Be sure to pay attention to messages displayed on the levels, otherwise you may find yourself falling off the edge into the water!

name: Football Heroes 2015
description: Football Heroes 2015 is here with an all new season of over-the-top arcade football action! Fight your way to the end zone using skill, strategy, and special moves to smash the competition and bring home the win. Power up your players and customize your roster to build the ultimate football team in the universe. You have never seen a football game quite like this!

name: Papa's Freezeria Deluxe
description: After starting a relaxing job at the oceanfront ice cream shop on Calypso Island, things get hectic when all of Papa Louie's crazy customers arrive on the island! Now it's up to you to single-handedly craft and serve tasty sundae treats throughout the year. You'll whip up delicious Freezer sundaes by pouring ice cream, adding mixables and syrups, blending sundaes, and finally adding whipped cream and toppings for that perfect summertime treat. You'll need to multitask between each area of the restaurant, where each station is a unique hands-on experience.

name: NumberMaze
description: NumberMaze is an educational game where players get to practice their math skills. The game consists of a number of mazes that the player has to navigate his way through to get to a castle. Viewed from a top down perspective the player moves his character by clicking with the mouse. The mazes have many doorways that the player has to go through. To pass through these the player has to solve math problems. There are also doors that are locked and for these the player first have to locate a key to open. Scattered through the mazes are also books which the player has to collect before he gets access to the castle.

name: Ball Animals

name: Final Nights
description:
Something is here and it wants revenge

Years after the incident that caused our favourite restuarant to be shut down, it's reborn and not as good as it used to be. However it's rapid decline in visitors due to supposed hauntings has doomed the restuarant once again, as a nightguard the ghosts have now followed you home, yet this one is different.

Is it trying to take your soul? Or is it trying to tell you something?

Defend yourself, and try to get rid of this curse in Final Nights!

description:
That which you have created is now tormenting you.
The animatronics are burnt and beaten but they're alive, and they know what you did!

In the sequel to the FNaF fangame Final Nights it is your duty to fix these abominations during the day, and survive their torment during the night.

After setting up your make-shift security system and other precautions you are ready to take on the terror and end this nightmare once and for all!

Or are you?

name: Regional Power II
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Nights 3: Nightmares Awaken
description:
Sleep tight.

Doctor, we've got some news about the patient that was taken into intensive care recently. He seems to walk around his room at night, as if he is seeing things.

Pretending to use a flashlight and screaming. We're not sure if the loss of his frontal lobe has any influence on this behaviour.

name: Amaura on the High Seas
description:
Broke and stuck without a job, Amaura's life has hit a new low. So she does what any logical Pokemon would do: become a pirate, of course!
In this Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Rom Hack, help Amaura become a pirate in a whole new adventure!

name: Regional Power III
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Tale
description: A visual novel with an original story that takes place after the end of the Undertale story!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Stonehenge
description:
A special prehistoric location with friends from the future.
This DLC includes:
- Roller coaster map: Stonehenge.
- One roller coaster cart.

name: War on the Street
description: War on the Street is a top-down shooter game in which you have to fight a group of terrorists occupying the streets of Zamir city. Take them out, run or die.

name: To Heart 2 XRated
description: To Heart 2 XRated is an expanded game of the original To Heart 2, which adds new scenes.

name: Corpse Disaster: Survivors
description: In another failed invasion plan you were caught in a storm Cut off contact with friends who have worked together for many years The city was thrown into a mess by the explosion of the laboratory and the spread of the virus You are blocked by many virus-infected creatures and enemies.

name: Final Nights 4: Fates Entwined
description:
The untold stories of Final Nights

In Final Nights 4 you will explore the original Fredbear's Family Diner and much more from 2 different perspectives.

name: Final Nights Redux and Knuckles
description:
The gameplay and graphical marvel that was the totally fully completed Final Nights Redux comes back better than ever! Now with Knuckles the Echidna from the Sonic The Hedgehog franchise!
Knuckles is a friend by your side! An ally in combat! Wanted in 34 States!

name: SynthCave
description: Defend your upgrade station and light your path using your gun while blasting away at enemies in this Synthwave inspired arcade wave shooter! Buy upgrades like Light Poles to illuminate areas and turrets to mow down the incoming waves. Can you take on the horde or will they take your station from you with sheer numbers? Find out now!

name: Lemmings
description: The Game Boy version of Lemmings sees similar gameplay ported to a system that wasn't very suited to it, such as the tiny screen, lack of mouse and downgraded graphics.

name: Nanoman
description: A fan game heavily inspired by the early Mega Man series.

name: Against All Odds
description: Of Arawn is asked something much greater than what he is prepared to give... that's when his true journey begins.

name: One Piece Odyssey: Traveling Outfit Set
description: Includes Energy Apple x 10, Excite Apple x 10, Golden Jelly x 3, 100,000 Berries, and Traveling Outfit Set for Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, Usopp, Nami, Chopper, and Robin.

name: Castle Warriors
description: Castle Warriors is a rogue lite auto battler with a strategy twist. Build your army one card at a time from over fifty units!

name: Dino V. Xeno
description: Dino V. Xeno is a casual, simple, yet deeply crafted tower defense game, in which you can enlist 10 upgradable dinosaurs, plus 14 additional special towers, to battle alien invader hordes. With randomized elements, 51 levels and 12-16 hours of gameplay, DVX is a tailor made for tower defense lovers.

name: Polyturned
description: Your goal is to survive in a city overrun by zombies, team up with friends to mine resources, build forts and explore the abandoned city.

name: The King of Cats
description: Navigate the claustrophobic corridors of a cargo ship and try to survive a night with man-eating tigers on the loose. Your choices will determine who lives and who dies.

name: WordSplit
description:
Complete the broken words to increase vocabulary in this best word game ever.
Thousands of words are broken so you need to complete and fix them. Enjoy connecting broken words to complete and it will help to increase your broken vocabulary.

name: White Out Survival
description:
White Out Survival is the first-ever survival strategy game to center on a glacial apocalypse theme. Fascinating mechanics and intricate details await you to explore!
The catastrophic decline in global temperatures has wreaked havoc on human society. Those who have made it out of their crumbling homes are now faced with a new set of challenges: vicious blizzards, ferocious beasts, and opportunistic bandits looking to prey on their despair.

name: Spinning Pong
description: A simple but strongly addictive game that was created during one evening!

name: Sky Piper
description:
Race through a wide variety of arcade style obstacles, spanning across 50 levels!
Steer your jets through increasingly difficult tunnels, pipes and caves. Win at higher levels to receive higher rewards!

name: Scooter Boy
description: Classic endless runner gameplay with an innovative swiping twist.

name: Pigeon Wings Strike
description: Duke Dexter and his evil minions are back to take over Velo City. They have all new tricks and traps to cook Pigeon's tenders—it's more than a bird can handle.

name: Obstacle Course Car Parking
description: Welcome to the Obstacle Course - the Ultimate Test of your Car Control & Precision Parking Skills!

name: Motocross Racing
description: Experience the speed and excitement of real dirt bike racing with Motocross Racer! The motorcycles and riders move and react just like the real thing! Unlock up to 60 tracks racing against the game’s 4 built-in opponents (2 at a time), your friends (by sending them your replays), or even against your own replays.

name: Moto X Challenge
description: This is cool and challenging game!

name: Mini Pocket Racers
description: Mini Pocket Racer is a retroarcade race car game where you choose your car and run thru the fastest Traffic and obstacles to gain access to exotic cars.

name: Kontra
description: Fast paced shooter features multiplayer zombie mode, surf online, deathrun online, deathmatch online and arms race online. Zombie mode includes different gameplay mechanics: zombie classes and various shop items. Deathrun mode includes knife types and day types.

name: Isowords
description: The cult classic word search game on a cube is back, and better than ever!

name: Fatty In Trouble
description:
Fatty tries to fly with help of wings. He accidentally comes to food land. So now, Fatty is in food land.
Food land has junk food as well as healthy food. Fatty is already so fatty that he can’t tolerate more junk food as they may put him in trouble. Fatty should eat only healthy food to be safe and avoid trouble.
Your purpose is to avoid fatty colliding with junk food and eat only healthy food which come as he fly forward.
Help fatty in his food adventure and try to cover distance as much as possible and try to come safe out of the food land.

name: Disaster Dash
description:
In this runner, you must avoid disasters such as tornadoes, fires, lava, aliens, and zombies!
Jump to avoid harm and collect coins to unlock other disaster modes.

name: Dino Rush Race
description:
Go faster than your opponents in this competitive racing game!
This is the sequel of 2010 critically acclaimed Dino Rush game
Eat fruits to keep your energy high and go faster.
Dodge obstacles, flying predators, and quicksand!
Use powerful boosters to get faster.
Defeat opponents from all over the word and break new world records.
Discover unique levels through the campaign map.
Want more? Create your own levels and share with others. Play the best levels our community created!

name: Crazy Boss
description:
Do you have a crazy boss? Mine was simply mad! All I wanted is just to leave work on time so I can go out with my boyfriend, but as soon as he finds out, he ordered everyone else in the office to try and stop me! How insane! But I'm not afraid. I will make it out of the office on time, I wont be late for my date, no matter what!
My plan is to ride on my office chair, so that i can slide through the office corridors at high speed. But who knows what my crazy boss will do to try and stop me? Luckily, some of my colleagues are on my side, they have placed some very useful gadgets on my escape path, and that's just gonna make my escape so much easier. The better upgrades of the gadgets will no doubt be at a higher prices. But coins are in ridiculous abundance here, laying all over the place in my office, so just try and pick as many of them up as you can on your way out and you will be rich in no time.

name: Cross Match!
description: Cross Match! is a simple and fun casual game, but addictive.

name: Angel Adventures
description:
Buckle up and be part of a daring and compelling adventure!
From the Scandinavian region of adventurous explorers and tasteful design, comes a multiple award winning, innovative, enjoyable and original game engineered to bring out the best in you.
If you are a fan of swashbuckling adventures, then this fun-packed game is a must buy.
Angel Adventures is an internationally acclaimed and multiple award winning adventure game featuring mischievous angels, fierce pirates, dangerous dragons and ice monsters! Story, visuals, game play, music – everything is top notch and delivers a bounty of beautiful, creative, engrossing play.
This epic journey into magical worlds, made by one of the most experinced gameproduction companies in Norway will steal hours of your time, hours so full of superb gaming that you will never forget them.
There is a lot to do in massive open worlds, and the game exudes a charm that quickly sweeps away any frustrations. Outmaneuver your enemies, help charming characters in distress and let your two angels collaborate on tasks using individual strengths.

name: Cosmic Pool
description: Antigravity pool in outer space! Now with new and improved controls! Cosmic Pool is 3D space pool with a twist: it takes place in zero gravity inside of a force-field bounded geometry. Games can be played inside of a cube, a pyramid or a sphere, each shape having its own unique characteristics. The rules of Cosmic Pool are similar to 8 ball pool: all of the balls of one type (striped or solid) are “pocketed” by knocking them through goals on the sides and/or corners of the geometry. Then the player must pocket the 8 ball to win the game. The controls allow you to take single, bank or combination shots and you can play against a computer or a human opponent.

name: Crash Mayhem
description: Let the anger seize you and cause chaos in the city, but only in Crash Mayhem. You´re the protagonist of the Bravo Games Tribune Headlines, but now in reality.

name: My Lady Juliet
description:
You may be a trust fund baby, but you work hard to achieve your dreams:
Making your mark, and maybe finding love along the way.
Sadly, your parents have other plans, surprising you with a fiance.

Are you bound by your parents' choice?
Or does the voice beyond your balcony offer something more?

name: Dousoukai wa Koi no Hajimari
description: Visual novel by Voltage Inc.

name: Kaseifu Koi wa Keiyaku Kara
description: Visual novel by Voltage inc.

name: Office Secrets
description:
Office Secrets is an otome game by Voltage Inc. It is available on Android and iPhone.

Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: A Knight's Devotion
description: A Knight's Devotion is an otome game from Voltage Inc. You are princess who falls in love with one of the knights who escorts and protects you.

name: Class Trip Crush
description: Class Trip Crush is an otome game by Voltage Inc. A former standalone app, it has since migrated to Love 365: Find Your Story.

name: Koi no Tsuzuki wa Honeymoon de
description: A Visual novel by Voltage Inc.

name: Kiss of Revenge
description: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Codename: Cupid
description: Codename: Cupid is a spy based romance game and was released on the Love 365: Find Your Story.

name: Wanted: Romance Renegades
description: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Fisher Online: China
description: The prototype for this lake was the Lake Xihu 29 species of inhabitants, of which 12 are found only at this locatio AI-map generation, 8 kilometers of coastline, 2.4 sq. km of water area, three game zones: channels, shallow waters, deep water.

name: Doraemon: Nobita's Resident Evil 2
description: Doraemon: Nobita's Resident Evil 2 (also known as Nobihaza 2) is the sequel to Doraemon: Nobita's Resident Evil, an RPG-Maker game that is set in the Resident Evil universe with characters from the Doraemon anime.

name: Be My Princess
description: Be My Princess is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You fall in love with a prince and establish an inter-class romance with royalty.

name: Be My Princess: Party
description: A remaster of Be My Princess - the graphics are much more clean cut, icons were redesigned and new ones were also added.

name: Be My Princess 2
description:
Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

The sequel to Be My Princess, set 50 years after the first game and featuring the original six princes' grandsons and son plus two new princes.

name: My Forged Wedding: Party
description: A remaster of My Forged Wedding.

name: My Wedding and 7 Rings
description: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Dreamy Days in West Tokyo
description:
Dreamy Days in West Tokyo is an otome game by Voltage Inc.

Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Serendipity Next Door
description: Serendipity Next Door is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are an office worker who falls in love with one of your neighbors at the apartment complex.

name: Metro PD: Close to You
description: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Enchanted in the Moonlight
description:
Is he only after my power? Or is this love real…? Life as you know it changes forever when you're rescued by an otherworldly ayakashi. "Give me your power and I'll protect you." If I agree, my body and soul are his…

Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Old Builds
description: Five Nights at Treasure Island is a FNaF inspired fan game that was originally made by Anart1996 the owner of Five Nights at Treasure Island and Purity Sinners. This version of the title consists of Demo 1, Demo 2, Remastered Demo, AI Demo, Demo 3, and Alpha Test.

name: Blue Oddities: The Final Chapter
description:
Blue Oddities is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, a point and click horror game in the Oddities series, and is a sequel to Green Oddities.
It is created by the Radiance Team and was mentioned to be the final chapter of the game.

name: Dragon Survivors
description: Valkathien has returned! Choose a mighty warrior to play as, and fight through hordes of enemies in a pulse pounding action game. Gather power ups, increase your strength, and see if you have the skill to last long enough to challenge the Dragon. Battle against fate. Prove yourself a Dragon Survivor!

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island
description:
This is an official reboot of the infamous FNaF fangame "Five Nights At Treasure Island."
This reboot will complete what Anart1996 started with a whole new story included. This game will feature new and updated gameplay, as well as an interesting and terrifying atmosphere. Welcome to the island.

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Anniversary Edition
description:
For 6 years, Photo-Negative Mickey and his friends have terrified audiences across the internet. For one last time, you can experience that terror.

On December 1, 2014, Anart1996 would announce his FNaF fangame... "Five Nights at Treasure Island."

FNaTI would go on to pioneer the fangame scene and change the way we see Mickey Mouse and the Disney Corporation.

For the game's (late) birthday, the Radiance Team has decided to release a special version of FNaTI to commemorate the game. Enjoy.

name: Five Nights at Chuck E. Cheese's: Rebooted
description: This is an official complete reboot of the popular 2015 FNaF fangame "Five Nights at Chuck E. Cheese's." Featuring new mechanics, graphics, and more while still keeping the spirit of the original game.

name: Hentai Military
description: Hentai Military is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of military and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: The Voice from the Well: The Velessar Saga
description: Stranded in a foreign world, Jay must fight to reclaim his stolen memories as mysterious forces conspire!

name: Warplanes Bundle
description: Become a legend of air combat in Warplanes Bundle! Two thrilling flight combat games together - Warplanes: WW2 Dogfight and Warplanes: WW1 Sky Aces.

name: Rumble Sus
description: Rumble Sus is a fast-paced social deduction party game. Players learn their identity at the beginning by whether or not their controller is rumbling without others knowing. Once the game starts, the Traitors need to find teammates and try to defeat all the Innocents without being exposed. Meanwhile, the Innocents need to utilize items on the map and their wit to find dubious players and defeat all the Traitors. Pick up your controller and have a chaotic game full of laughter and suspicion with your friends!

name: Psychophonies: What Ghosts Say
description: Do you want to escape from the ghosts? You'll have to answer all their questions correctly, only then will you be able to save yourself. Will you be able to remember all your answers?

name: Arsonist Heaven Remastered
description: Arsonist Heaven is a retro-styled action platformer where you as a mercenary equipped with a jetpack and flamethrower will incinerate mutants in dangerous locations.

name: Mech Tech
description: In MECH TECH, Up to 8 players or bots duke it out locally in fast-paced battles! Switch between action and strategy gameplay at any time! From within your Command Tank, deploy your forces to the battlefield and use powerful abilities. Exit the Command Tank to join the fight in a powerful Hero Mech!

name: Early-blooming Black Lily
description: Maybe it was the curse of the black lilies that bloomed early in the winter - A girl falls in love with a girl before graduation. Her pure feelings are torn apart by a "tragic loop". You will weave her feelings by interrupting choices and typing letters.

name: Forbidden Trip
description: A Total Conversion for Amnesia: TDD. A parallel space & time, your story. No memories of last night. Strange. Being a little paranoid, you junkie? Reconsider your bad habits someday… for now, recover crucial documents before leaving the country tomorrow. Be quick, don't think. Easy.

name: Mail Mole: 'Xpress Deliveries
description:
Mail Mole: 'Xpress Deliveries is a FREE content update featuring:

8 speed-focused brand new levels
New costumes from awarded indie games
New photo mode to create summer postcards
New Boss Rush mode to challenge your abilities
New speedrun options for the fastest mailmoles
Free for all Mail Mole owners!

name: Sent to the Office
description:
You stand outside the door to her office. You're not sure why you've been called in, and certainly have no idea what to expect from her. If nothing else, this might be the chance you've been looking for to ogle her, just a bit...

She's a curvaceous vixen, stacked from chest to cock. When trapped in her office, what can you get away with-- and how will you be brought into line?

name: Astro Bears: Non-Bears
description: Sin descripción

name: Yoga Master: Magic Atmosphere Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: CalmLine
description: Overcome levels with the help of various tools and your mind. Are you sure it's easy?

name: Babs' Potion Shop
description: Have fun bullying our sheep/witch Babs! 15 transformations in 1.0 and a juicy victory screen starring Babs and her loved one.

name: The Curse of Kubel + Expansion DLC
description: Return to Asserya, and visit your favorite characters again with all-new character art and voiced dialogue!

name: Modo Defence
description: Modo Defense is a strategy tower defense game. Spin yut, similar to dice, to obtain various resources and summon or strengthen towers. You can customize your tower however you like. Specialize in multi-attack or strong one-by-one! And we have to stop the demons coming in. How far can you stop it?

name: Dead Age: Survivors
description: Dead Age: Survivors is an Indie Survival RPG with a touch of strategy. Complex quests and real-time pauseable party combat. Loot resources, build camps, and conquer new areas in battles against 7 greedy factions. Farm animals, cook, and brew beer! Pay close attention to hunger, stress, and morale.

name: Manacle
description: Menacle is set in an impoverished town where players take on the role of a desperate father who becomes a black-market doctor. Players will face chilling as they uncover the secrets behind the town's decline and the source of its evil. Get ready for a thrilling and intense gaming experience.

name: Plot Hole
description:
After months of careful renovations, the Pleasure Temple finally opens its doors to the public. The last sanctuary for queer fat lust, enormous strangers arrive from all over, feral for the pleasures of fat filth. It's the perfect time for the high priestess to try out the Temple’s latest addition…

Plot Hole is an episodic CYOA-style erotic game where players switch between the POVs of sleazy fat strangers at a bathhouse glory hole — to learn more about them or simply craft the steamiest encounter! It’s my love letter to fat kink, bathhouses, and cruising. Our next episode is slated to drop Summer 2023.

name: Glass Wings
description: Glass Wings is a fast paced third-person parkour platformer. Explore a stunning minimalist world in a series of linear courses in which your only objective is to complete the level. No combat, no story - just run.

name: Special Courier
description: Special things require special attitude!

name: Backroom
description: Based on Alice in Borderland, SCP-096 and The Backrooms Saga. Explore, think, interact, fight, but be careful, SCP-096 could be hidden anywhere...

name: Zombie Warz
description: Zombie Warz is a strategy survivor RTS with rogue-lite gameplay elements. Play as the king of a kingdom under siege by zombies and survive to discover their origins.

name: Songs of Silence
description: Songs of Silence is an Art Nouveau-inspired fantasy strategy game with a unique mix of turn-based kingdom management, hero development and real-time combat.

name: Once a Tale
description: You are invited to step into the enchanting world of fairy tales like never before. Play as Hansel and Gretel in this unique stop-motion-style single-player 3rd-person narrative adventure where you'll uncover mysteries, solve puzzles, and meet a reimagined cast of beloved fairytale characters.

name: Restaurant Builder
description: Equipped with a high-pressure washer, jackhammer, and a highly addictive spray gun, you face the construction of a restaurant the world has never seen. Tear down walls, build, destroy, paint, and decorate, utilizing real physics, and dynamic lighting to bring empty space to life.

name: Autumn-Time Trade-Up
description: A game about speed, optimization, and exploration! Meet loads of unique characters on your way to the top of the spire! You are given four minutes to save Thanksgiving through various wacky means. Can you get everyone to the top of the Spire for the perfect Thanksgiving feast?

name: Gunlocked: The 2nd Gunning
description: A sci-fi action roguelike in space. Gunlocked is a twin stick shooter without the twin stick. Choose from multiple unique characters, dodge enemies, equip powerful upgrades, fight huge bosses, and drink your morning coffee with your free hand. Then do it all again for a brand new experience.

name: Fool's Curse
description: Fight your way through 13 retro inspired stages. Utilize the powers of your enemies to create over 70 magic spells and explore multiple routes on your way to the mysterious castle!

name: SD Gundam G Generation Cross Rays: Added Dispatch Mission Set 2
description:
Additional Dispatch Mission Set 2 Contents
- Added Dispatch: After War Gundam X, For the Coming Generation Mission!
- Added Dispatch: ∀ Gundam, Unstoppable Wind Mission!
- Added Dispatch: Reconguista in G, Bellri's War and Aida's Decision Mission!
- Added Dispatch: Mobile Suit Gundam AGE, Endless Times Mission!

name: Nonotown
description: Play classic and colored nonograms or picross.

name: Touhou Fractured Transience
description: A 2D Platform Fighter with elements of the Shoot'em up genre. Wield the powers and abilities of characters from Touhou, hit your opponent as hard as possible and send them flying in a beautiful yet unhinged Battle of Bullets!

name: Beehive Bedlam
description: Beehive Bedlam is a game playable on Sky TVs in the UK using your television's remote control. The player must shoot coloured bubbles to the top of the screen to make combinations of three or more of the same bubble to clear the board in the style of Puzzle Bubble (Bust-A-Move).

name: Desperate Skeleton
description: In this 3D fantasy third-person rougelike game you will begin the journey of the desperate skeleton in which you will explore dungeons, fight enemies and acquire equipment and skills from them. It will be quite a journey on which even death cannot bother you.

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Tromsø XP
description: With Tromsø XP, Jo Erlend Sund and Stairport Sceneries have created another beautiful Norwegian airport scenery for XPlane 11. This scenery depicts an extremely detailed recreation of Tromsø Airport on the island Tromsøya as well as its surroundings.

name: You are the Judge!
description: As a judge of the Kobardde court, solve complex cases inspired by actual events. Your decisions will directly affect people's (and perhaps yours) lives. You may have to make difficult decisions for your family, country, and life. What kind of judge will you be?

name: Echo Storm
description: Echo Storm is a 2D action with roguelite elements. Survive enemies attack as long as possible. Death resets the progress, but the longer you survive, the more abilities your character gets. Onslaught of enemies is growing too, so - find best abilities combination and destroy 'em all!

name: Walkies
description: Happy-go-lucky dog helps save a local rescue centre, with help from furry (and not so furry) friends! Wag those tails and bound and bounce your way through this whimsical adventure!

name: Engine Roar
description: Engine Roar is a hardcore race for survival on rusty post-apocalyptic wastelands, under the noisy roar of engines in pixel 3D styling.

name: Moving Through Life
description: Together with the main heroine of the game, go through important stages of her life. Help her set up homes and feel her experience through her belongings. The game has simple rules and control: move items to where you think they should be. The game has no scores, time limits, or complex tasks.

name: Obsta-Loop
description: The Spiritual Successor to our NES classic, Exit-Loop. Its the new most Fun-Zaniest, Insaneist, Death-Loopiest, Crypt-Pillageist experience ever! Now with power-ups, masks, Multiplayer on PC.

name: My First Horse: Adventures on Seahorse Island
description: Adventure awaits with Olivia and her trusty horse on a stunning island full of excitement and mystery. Join them on thrilling quests and explore beautiful landscapes. This horse game has something for everyone. Don't miss out on this immersive experience. Saddle up and join the adventure!

name: Flirting with Yasmine
description: Relationship simulation with free roaming in key locations, interactive dialogs and mild stat building.

name: Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars - Fangs and Bones
description: The Fangs&Bones DLC includes two unique Lords, the Winter Wolf and the Skeleton King, ready to lead your armys of the night to victory. They both come with unique abilities and character models and are available as Lords for your armies.

name: Crash and Run
description: Race. Compete. Run. Clash head to head with your friends, ducking and weaving obstacle to obstacle until you prove yourself to be the best once and for all.

name: Crash-San
description: Crash-San destroys the spirit. Use jumps and guns to get the treasure before the spirit is destroyed.Action game.Aim for the goal with limited life.Three different stages await you.Each stage has traps to make you suffer.

name: Vain Dream
description: Vain Dream is a RPG with traditionally Japanese emphasis on story and characters, as well as simple game mechanics and mostly linear progression. Its turn-based combat allows free movement on the battlefield.

name: Vain Dream II
description: Sin descripción

name: Mock 2: The Speed of Stupid
description: Mock 2: The Speed of Stupid is a comedic level pack for DOOM II and a spiritual successor to Mockery. Described by many as "so stupid that it's funny", the mod relies on ridiculous enemy placement, gratuitous abuse of ZDoom features, and intentionally displeasing map design – mocking the most common map design tropes of its time.

name: SD Gundam G Generation Cross Rays: Added Dispatch Mission Set 1
description: The Added Dispatch Mission Set 1 DLC package contains three bonus Dispatch Missions.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Soldier Summit Route
description: The stunning plains and valley passes of Utah make Soldier Summit one of the best loved mountain passes of the western United States.

name: Tavern Talk
description: Listen to stories of boasting glory and utter failure. Gather rumors, turn them into quests, and send the next adventurer on a journey that may change their life forever. Play the tavern owner, serve your drinks, and save the day! And while you’re at it why not uncover truths about a looming evil?

name: MicroCrawl
description: Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way back through a dark fantasy world to get back home.
